context: GitLab Inc. is a DevSecOps platform company focused on source code management, CI/CD, and security in single platform. Single DevSecOps platform. Competing with GitHub, Atlassian.

competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Primary competitor owned by Microsoft, leading code hosting and collaboration platform

competitors.name: Atlassian (Bitbucket)
competitors.notes: Git repository management integrated with Jira and Confluence

competitors.name: Azure DevOps
competitors.notes: Microsoft's DevOps platform with repos, pipelines, and project management

competitors.name: JFrog
competitors.notes: DevOps platform focused on artifact management and software supply chain

competitors.name: CircleCI
competitors.notes: CI/CD platform competing in continuous integration and delivery

competitors.name: Jenkins
competitors.notes: Open-source automation server widely used for CI/CD

competitors.name: Harness
competitors.notes: Modern software delivery platform with AI-powered DevOps

competitors.name: Snyk
competitors.notes: Developer security platform competing in DevSecOps
